docs.text: cilroy 🔗 kilroy controller 🎛️ Installing 🔗 Using pip : pip install cilroy Usage 🔗 To run the server, install the package and run the following command: cilroy This will start the server on port 12000 by default. Then you can communicate with the server, using any compatible client.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: To run the server, install the package and run the following command: cilroy This will start the server on port 12000 by default. Then you can communicate with the server, using any compatible client.
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: Usage 🔗 This package provides a controller implementation that complies with the kilroy controller API. It's responsible for managing the training process. It communicates with a face and a module. Running the server 🔗 To run the server, install the package and run the following command: cilroy This will start the server on port 12000 by default. Then you can communicate with the server, using any compatible client.
docs.title: Usage

docs.title: Running the server

docs.text: Post schedulers 🔗 Post schedulers are used to schedule posts to be published at a specific time. All implemented schedulers are listed below. IntervalPostScheduler 🔗 This scheduler publishes posts at a fixed interval. You can configure the interval and the base time from which the interval is counted.
docs.title: Post schedulers

docs.text: Post schedulers are used to schedule posts to be published at a specific time. All implemented schedulers are listed below.
docs.title: Post schedulers

docs.text: This scheduler publishes posts at a fixed interval. You can configure the interval and the base time from which the interval is counted.
docs.title: IntervalPostScheduler

docs.text: Score schedulers 🔗 Score schedulers are used to schedule a scoring of current batch of posts. All implemented schedulers are listed below. IntervalScoreScheduler 🔗 This scheduler performs scoring at a fixed interval. You can configure the interval and the base time from which the interval is counted.
docs.title: Score schedulers
